html:
{% set company = frappe.db.get_value( "Company", {"name": doc.company}, ["company_logo", "company_name"], as_dict=True) %} {% set work_order = frappe.db.get_value( "Work Order", {"name": doc.work_order}, ["custom_customer_name"], as_dict=True) %} {% set batchs = set(frappe.db.get_all( "Batch", {"reference_doctype": "Work Order", "reference_name": doc.work_order}, pluck="name")) | reject("none") | list %} {% set materials = set(frappe.db.get_all( "Item Customer Detail", {"parenttype": "Item", "parentfield": "customer_items", "parent": doc.production_item}, pluck="custom_material")) | reject("none") | list %} {% set build_sheets = set(frappe.db.get_all( "Item Customer Detail", {"parenttype": "Item", "parentfield": "customer_items", "parent": doc.production_item}, pluck="custom_drawing_build_sheet_no")) | reject("none") | list %}
LAMPHUN PLASTPACK CO., LTD.
{{ company.company_name or "-" }}
Run Card No.
{% if doc.custom_run_card %} {% set parts = doc.custom_run_card.split("/") %} {{ parts[0]|int }}/{{ parts[1] }} {% else %} - {% endif %}
Run Card Date
{{ doc.posting_date and frappe.utils.getdate(doc.posting_date).strftime("%d/%m/%Y") or "-" }}
Sequence
{{ doc.custom_sequence or "-" }}
Quantity on this Run Card
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.for_quantity) if doc.for_quantity - doc.for_quantity | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(doc.for_quantity) }}

Work Order No.
{{ doc.work_order or "-" }}
Lot No
{{ batchs and batchs | join(", ") or "-" }}
Customer
{{ work_order.custom_customer_name or "-" }}
Item Name
{{ doc.item_name or "-" }}
Material
{{ materials and materials | join(", ") or "-" }}
Build Sheet No.
{{ build_sheets and build_sheets | join(", ") or "-" }}

Operation
{{ doc.operation or "-" }}
Workstation
{{ doc.workstation or "-" }}
Operator
{{ doc.operator or "-" }}
Shift
{{ doc.shift or "-" }}
Start Date & Time
{{ doc.from_time and frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.from_time).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S") or "-" }}
End Date & Time
{{ doc.to_time and frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.to_time).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S") or "-" }}
IN
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.input) if doc.input - doc.input | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(doc.input) }}
OUT
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.output) if doc.output - doc.output | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(doc.output) }}
NG
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.defect) if doc.defect - doc.defect | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(doc.defect) }}
Yield
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(doc.percent_yield) if doc.percent_yield - doc.percent_yield | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(doc.percent_yield) }} %
{% if doc.job_card_defect and doc.job_card_defect | length > 0 %}

Defects
{% for item in doc.job_card_defect %}
{{ item.defect or "-" }}
{{ "{:,.0f}".format(item.qty) if item.qty - item.qty | int == 0 else "{:,.2f}".format(item.qty) }}
{% endfor %} {% endif %}

Status
{{ doc.status or "-" }}
Next Station
{{ doc.next_station or "-" }}
name: RunCard
